description: Vincent wakes up horny as fuck, and wants nothing more than to have Dalton Briggs help relieve him of his morning wood. Unsuccessful in waking Dalton from his slumber, Vincent takes matters into his own hands. He’s in for quite the surprise when Dalton’s stepdad Dirk hops into the bottom bunk with him for some discrete fun while Dalton snoozes up top.
title: Stepdick Part 2
